title: bhaktiyuDan anu
sahitya:
bhaktiyuDan anu raktiyuDan unnaip-pADi OmkArattirk-kUDum inbam aruLvAi


anupallavi

  sattiya vAkkuDan sanmArga nOkkuDan sAdhu sangattuDan jaya rAmakrSNavenrE


caraNam    paNNarindE tALa eNNarindE jnAnap-payanarindE shruti layamarindE aruL
kaNNarindE unnaik-kANum vaghaiyarindE karuNaiyaik-kUvi nAn aruNak-kuyil pOlE
